oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Some remarks on almost periodic time scales and almost periodic functions on time scales
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Li, Yongkun
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Classical Analysis and ODEs
26E70, 42A75
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this note we communicate some important remarks about the concepts of almost periodic time scales and almost periodic functions on time scales that are proposed by Wang and Agarwal in their recent papers (Adv. Difference Equ. (2015) 2015:312; Adv. Difference Equ. (2015) 2015:296; Math. Meth. Appl. Sci. 2015, DOI: 10.1002/mma.3590).
Comment: 10 pages. arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:1508.01002
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Electronic Journal of Mathematical Analysis and Applications, Vol. 5(1) Jan. 2017, pp. 42-49
